entities.name: MICROSOFT
entities.description: Microsoft is a technology company focused on digital transformation, justice reform, and increasing access to digital skills, especially for Black and African American communities. They also aim to recruit, develop, and retain diverse talent.

entities.name: MICROSOFT PHILANTHROPIES
entities.description: Microsoft Philanthropies is a division of Microsoft that invested $20 million in key non-profit partnerships to help people from underserved communities.

entities.name: BLACK CHANNEL PARTNER ALLIANCE
entities.description: The Black Channel Partner Alliance is a community initiative launched by Microsoft to support partners onboarding to the Microsoft Cloud and to unlock partner benefits for co-selling with Microsoft.

relationships.relationship_description: Microsoft Philanthropies is a division of Microsoft that focuses on investments in non-profit partnerships.
Microsoft launched the Black Channel Partner Alliance to support partners onboarding to the Microsoft Cloud.
